mapper.sql: id, owner_id, other_user_id, other_nickname, other_avatar, relation_type, conversation_status, is_initiator, is_blocked, is_blocked_by, unread_count, last_message, last_message_time, last_message_is_mine, is_pinned, is_muted, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_conversation ( owner_id, other_user_id, other_nickname, other_avatar, relation_type, conversation_status, is_initiator, is_blocked, is_blocked_by, unread_count, last_message, last_message_time, last_message_is_mine, is_pinned, is_muted, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{ownerId}, #{otherUserId}, #{otherNickname}, #{otherAvatar}, #{relationType}, #{conversationStatus}, #{isInitiator}, #{isBlocked}, #{isBlockedBy}, #{unreadCount}, #{lastMessage}, #{lastMessageTime}, #{lastMessageIsMine}, #{isPinned}, #{isMuted}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_conversation SET other_nickname = #{otherNickname}, other_avatar = #{otherAvatar}, relation_type = #{relationType}, conversation_status = #{conversationStatus}, is_blocked = #{isBlocked}, is_blocked_by = #{isBlockedBy}, unread_count = #{unreadCount}, last_message = #{lastMessage}, last_message_time = #{lastMessageTime}, last_message_is_mine = #{lastMessageIsMine}, is_pinned = #{isPinned}, is_muted = #{isMuted}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM user_conversation WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND owner_id != other_user_id ORDER BY is_pinned DESC, last_message_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(unread_count), 0) FROM user_conversation WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND is_muted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE user_conversation SET last_message = #{message}, last_message_time = NOW(), last_message_is_mine = #{isMine}, is_deleted = 0, update_time = NOW() WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND other_user_id = #{otherUserId}
